MESSAGE.JP: の男…？　一体誰なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: A mysterious man...? Who on earth could that be?
MESSAGE.Translation: A mysterious man...? Who on earth could that be?

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず見に行ってみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I should go see for myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should go see for myself.

MESSAGE.JP: けつけてみると、謎の男としか呼べない風貌の奴が立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I finally arrived at the designated point, the one I found standing there could truly be described as nothing but a ❛Mysterious man.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: When I finally arrived at the designated point, the one I found standing there could truly be described as nothing but a ❛Mysterious man.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっ、こいつと戦うの!?」
真人@「ああ…携帯のランキング、見ろよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah... Take a look at the rankings on the cellphone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah... Take a look at the rankings on the cellphone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、ああ…」
帯を開いて、ランキングを確認する。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.

MESSAGE.JP: 位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
０位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
１位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
らない人間がバトルランキングに加わってる！
MESSAGE.EN: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!
MESSAGE.Translation: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なら、挑まれた勝負は避けられねぇだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That means I can't refuse his challenge?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That means I can't refuse his challenge?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、そうだね…」
真人@「大丈夫だ、理樹。こんな奴見かけ倒しだ。簡単にひねって、ふたりで遊ぼうぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's okay, Riki. He's just a pushover. I'm gonna bring him down, and then we can play.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's okay, Riki. He's just a pushover. I'm gonna bring him down, and then we can play.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の体で今の順位って…真人も見かけ倒しだと思うけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite his large frame he has this rank... I think he's quite a pushover himself...
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite his large frame he has this rank... I think he's quite a pushover himself...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうなるといいね…」
真人@「いくぜ、おらぁぁぁぁぁーーっ!!」
謙吾@「ああ…携帯のランキングを見てみろよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah... Take a look at the rankings on the cellphone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah... Take a look at the rankings on the cellphone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、ああ…」
帯を開いて、ランキングを確認する。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.

MESSAGE.JP: 位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
０位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
１位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
らない人間がバトルランキングに加わってる！
MESSAGE.EN: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!
MESSAGE.Translation: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なら、バトルルール、挑まれた勝負は断れない、これが適応される」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That means that I can't refuse his challenge; I have to conform to the battle rules.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That means that I can't refuse his challenge; I have to conform to the battle rules.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なるほど…」
謙吾@「大丈夫だ、理樹。こんな奴に負けるほど俺は錆びついちゃいない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's okay, Riki. I'm not so rusty that I'll lose to someone like him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's okay, Riki. I'm not so rusty that I'll lose to someone like him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れで現在の順位って…完全に錆び付いてると思うけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why does he have this rank then... He's totally rusty...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why does he have this rank then... He's totally rusty...

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「こいやぁぁぁーーっ!!」
鈴@「ああ…携帯にものってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah... His name is in the cellphone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah... His name is in the cellphone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、ほんと？」
帯を開いて、ランキングを確認する。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.

MESSAGE.JP: 位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
０位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
１位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
らない人間がバトルランキングに加わってる！
MESSAGE.EN: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!
MESSAGE.Translation: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なら、断れない、というわけで戦うことになった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That means I can't refuse, I have no choice but to fight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That means I can't refuse, I have no choice but to fight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、そんなこと聞かされてもないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I haven't heard of anything like this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I haven't heard of anything like this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「大丈夫だ、理樹。恐いがやってみる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's okay, Riki. I'm scared but I'll do what I can.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's okay, Riki. I'm scared but I'll do what I can.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「しかし顔面こわっ！」
丈夫なんだろうか…。
鈴@「くりゃああぁあーーーっ！」
小毬@「うん…だって、ランキングに入ってるんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yeah... He's in the rankings after all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yeah... He's in the rankings after all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、ほんと？」
帯を開いて、ランキングを確認する。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.

MESSAGE.JP: 位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
０位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
１位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
らない人間がバトルランキングに加わってる！
MESSAGE.EN: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!
MESSAGE.Translation: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「よくわからないけど、挑まれたら断れないから、やるしかないんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'm not sure what's going on, but I can't refuse to fight, I have to do it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm not sure what's going on, but I can't refuse to fight, I have to do it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、そんなこと聞かされてもないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I haven't heard of anything like this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I haven't heard of anything like this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「私もだけど…」
小毬@「とても恐ろしい人が現れたよ…」
小毬@「ご挨拶したら『ケェーッ!!』って返されたよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝When I said hi to him, he answered with ❛Keeeeh!❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝When I said hi to him, he answered with ❛Keeeeh!❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「どこの人かもわからない…恐ろしい人！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I don't even know where he's from... What a frightening person!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I don't even know where he's from... What a frightening person!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 丈夫なんだろうか…。
小毬@「とりあえず、よろしくおねがいします～」
後は能天気だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She seems carefree to the end.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seems carefree to the end.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「知らんのか？　既にランキングにも登録されている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Don't you know? He's even registered with the rankings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Don't you know? He's even registered with the rankings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、ほんと？」
帯を開いて、ランキングを確認する。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.

MESSAGE.JP: 位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
０位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
１位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
らない人間がバトルランキングに加わってる！
MESSAGE.EN: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!
MESSAGE.Translation: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ふむ、まあ余興としては中々だな」
理樹@「でも、そんなこと聞かされてもないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I haven't heard of anything like this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I haven't heard of anything like this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「いいじゃないか。おねーさんも少しばかりやる気を取り戻したよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's okay. Onee-san's finally got a bit of her motivation back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's okay. Onee-san's finally got a bit of her motivation back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…まあ、どこぞの男も不甲斐ない連中に活を入れたかったというところか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Well, I don't exactly mind giving some cowardly man a little kick in the pants.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Well, I don't exactly mind giving some cowardly man a little kick in the pants.❞

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、来ヶ谷さんならよほど運が悪くない限りこんな順位になるとは思えないし…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, I don't think there's any other way Kurugaya-san could end up in last place save terrible luck...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, I don't think there's any other way Kurugaya-san could end up in last place save terrible luck...

MESSAGE.JP: しでもやる気になってるなら、あるいは…。
MESSAGE.EN: If she gets even a little motivated, she'll be fine...
MESSAGE.Translation: If she gets even a little motivated, she'll be fine...

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「開幕だ。楽しい舞踏になるといいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Act one is about to begin. Let it turn into a great show.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Act one is about to begin. Let it turn into a great show.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキも知らないのですか？　ランキングにはもう入っていますが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You don't know about it, Riki? His name is on the rankings...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You don't know about it, Riki? His name is on the rankings...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、ほんと？」
帯を開いて、ランキングを確認する。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.

MESSAGE.JP: 位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
０位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
１位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
らない人間がバトルランキングに加わってる！
MESSAGE.EN: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!
MESSAGE.Translation: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こんなこと聞かされてもないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I haven't heard of that at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I haven't heard of that at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ではいったい何者なのでしょう？」
クド@「さっき『名を名乗れい！』とカッコよく言ってみたら、とても怖い形相で睨まれました…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I told him ❛Name yourself!❜ in a very cool manner, but he only gave me a threatening glare in return...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I told him ❛Name yourself!❜ in a very cool manner, but he only gave me a threatening glare in return...❞

MESSAGE.JP: れでビビるクドは、とてもカッコよくない。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud's small, scared figure was far from the definition of cool.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud's small, scared figure was far from the definition of cool.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ですが、頑張らないと順位が上がらないのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But I have to work hard or I won't go up in the rankings...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But I have to work hard or I won't go up in the rankings...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 丈夫なんだろうか…。
クド@「いざ勝負なのですっ！」
葉留佳@「うーん、これに登録されてますからネ」
理樹@「え、ほんと？」
帯を開いて、ランキングを確認する。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.

MESSAGE.JP: 位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
０位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
１位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
らない人間がバトルランキングに加わってる！
MESSAGE.EN: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!
MESSAGE.Translation: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「誰か知らないけど、こりゃあ面白いことになってるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I have no idea who he is, but it sure sounds like fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I have no idea who he is, but it sure sounds like fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、そんなこと聞かされてもないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I haven't heard of anything like this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I haven't heard of anything like this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「ん？　なんか愉快な人みたいだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Mm? He sounds like a funny chap.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Mm? He sounds like a funny chap.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「あんな仮面ごときではるちんはビビったりはしませんし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Haruchin won't cower in fear of someone with a silly mask like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Haruchin won't cower in fear of someone with a silly mask like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こんな順位に留まってる人とは思えない強気だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She sure sounded confident for someone in last place.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She sure sounded confident for someone in last place.

MESSAGE.JP: 丈夫なんだろうか…。
葉留佳@「さあっ、変なのを倒して順位挽回するよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Alright, I'm gonna beat this weirdo and move up in the rankings!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Alright, I'm gonna beat this weirdo and move up in the rankings!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「どなたかは知りませんが、ランキングにも登録されているようです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I don't know who he may be, but his name seems to be on the rankings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I don't know who he may be, but his name seems to be on the rankings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、ほんと？」
帯を開いて、ランキングを確認する。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my cellphone and looked at the rankings.

MESSAGE.JP: 位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
０位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
１位…マスク・ザ・斉藤…
らない人間がバトルランキングに加わってる！
MESSAGE.EN: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!
MESSAGE.Translation: Some stranger had been added to the battle rankings!

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「あまりエレガントな容貌とはいい難いですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝His appearance could hardly be considered elegant though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝His appearance could hardly be considered elegant though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こんなこと聞かされてもないよ…」
西園@「ですが、ルールはルールなので…」
ういうが、相手の発するオーラはただ事ではない。
MESSAGE.EN: She may be saying that, but he has a formidable aura.
MESSAGE.Translation: She may be saying that, but he has a formidable aura.

MESSAGE.JP: いじょうぶだろうか…。
西園@「では、いきます」
園さんなら、サイバーな武器さえあればいい勝負が出来そうだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: At least as long as she has her cyber weapons, it's going to be an even battle...
MESSAGE.Translation: At least as long as she has her cyber weapons, it's going to be an even battle...

MESSAGE.JP: 手の発するオーラもただ事ではない。
MESSAGE.EN: The opponent has a formidable aura.
MESSAGE.Translation: The opponent has a formidable aura.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「では、はじめましょうか、科学部部隊」
科学部@「はっ」
真人@「勝っちまった!?」
理樹@「えー、こんなに隠しキャラっぽいのに!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh, even though he totally looked like some kinda hidden character!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh, even though he totally looked like some kinda hidden character!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「さすが最強のオレだぜ…」
理樹@「上を見てから言ってよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why don't you look at the rankings and say that again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why don't you look at the rankings and say that again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「マスク・ザ・斉藤…」
真人@「てめぇ、一体何者だ…」
マスクザ斉藤@「ただの斉藤さ」
マスクザ斉藤@「ふ…これから激動のランキングが始まるぜ、はりゃほれうまうーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Hah... I'm gonna rock up the rankings, harya hore umau!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Hah... I'm gonna rock up the rankings, harya hore umau!❞

MESSAGE.JP: の男は去っていった。
らは呆然と見送るしかなかったのだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Dumbfounded, we could do nothing but watch him walk off...
MESSAGE.Translation: Dumbfounded, we could do nothing but watch him walk off...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレと互角かよ…」
真人@「マスク・ザ・斉藤…」
真人@「てめぇ、一体何者だ…」
マスクザ斉藤@「ただの斉藤さ」
マスクザ斉藤@「ふ…これから激動のランキングが始まるぜ、はりゃほれうまうーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Hah... I'm gonna rock up the rankings, harya hore umau!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Hah... I'm gonna rock up the rankings, harya hore umau!❞

MESSAGE.JP: の男は去っていった。
らは呆然と見送るしかなかったのだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Dumbfounded, we could do nothing but watch him walk off...
MESSAGE.Translation: Dumbfounded, we could do nothing but watch him walk off...

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「勝ったぞ!?」
理樹@「えー、こんなに隠しキャラっぽいのに!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh, even though he totally looked like some kinda hidden character!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh, even though he totally looked like some kinda hidden character!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「まあまだまだ道は長い…たゆまぬ努力が必要だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'm still inexperienced... I must keep putting in effort.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'm still inexperienced... I must keep putting in effort.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね…」
謙吾@「マスク・ザ・斉藤…」
謙吾@「おまえ、一体何者だ…」
マスクザ斉藤@「ただの斉藤さ」
マスクザ斉藤@「ふ…これから激動のランキングが始まるぜ、はりゃほれうまうーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Hah... I'm gonna rock up the rankings, harya hore umau!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Hah... I'm gonna rock up the rankings, harya hore umau!❞

MESSAGE.JP: の男は去っていった。
らは呆然と見送るしかなかったのだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Dumbfounded, we could do nothing but watch him walk off...
MESSAGE.Translation: Dumbfounded, we could do nothing but watch him walk off...

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「やるじゃないか…」
謙吾@「マスク・ザ・斉藤…」
謙吾@「おまえ、一体何者だ…」
マスクザ斉藤@「ただの斉藤さ」
マスクザ斉藤@「ふ…これから激動のランキングが始まるぜ、はりゃほれうまうーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Hah... I'm gonna rock up the rankings, harya hore umau!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Hah... I'm gonna rock up the rankings, harya hore umau!❞

MESSAGE.JP: の男は去っていった。
らは呆然と見送るしかなかったのだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Dumbfounded, we could do nothing but watch him walk off...
MESSAGE.Translation: Dumbfounded, we could do nothing but watch him walk off...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「え？　勝った!?」
理樹@「えー!?　こんなに隠しキャラっぽいのに!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh, even though he totally looked like some kinda hidden character!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh, even though he totally looked like some kinda hidden character!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「強いなあたし…なんでこんなところでくすぶってるんだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm so strong... Why am I still in last place...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm so strong... Why am I still in last place...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね…これからは頑張ろうね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's right... You have to keep working hard from here on too...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's right... You have to keep working hard from here on too...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「マスク・ザ・斉藤…」
鈴@「おまえだれだ…」
マスクザ斉藤@「ただの斉藤さ」
マスクザ斉藤@「ふ…これから激動のランキングが始まるぜ、はりゃほれうまうーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Hah... I'm gonna rock up the rankings, harya hore umau!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Hah... I'm gonna rock up the rankings, harya hore umau!❞

MESSAGE.JP: の男は去っていった。
らは呆然と見送るしかなかったのだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Dumbfounded, we could do nothing but watch him walk off...
MESSAGE.Translation: Dumbfounded, we could do nothing but watch him walk off...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんとか互角か…」
鈴@「マスク・ザ・斉藤…」
鈴@「おまえだれだ…」

MESSAGE.JP: の男は去っていった。
らは呆然と見送るしかなかったのだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Dumbfounded, we could do nothing but watch him walk off...
MESSAGE.Translation: Dumbfounded, we could do nothing but watch him walk off...

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「やったよ！　勝ったよー！」
理樹@「えー!?　こんなに隠しキャラっぽいのに!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh, even though he totally looked like some kinda hidden character!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh, even though he totally looked like some kinda hidden character!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「実は私、ものすごい強いんだよー」
小毬@「さあ、正体を見せ…あれ、いない」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Now, reveal your real ident...! Huh, he's gone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「小毬さんに負けたんじゃ、恥ずかしくて顔も見せられないんじゃないかな…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He probably couldn't show his face out of embarrassment of losing to you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「恐ろしいよ…だって、元々顔を見せてもいないのに…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝How scary... He never even showed his face...❞

MESSAGE.JP: しかし、なんだったんだろう。
っぱり負けた。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝And he didn't even make me get serious. How boring.❞
